mapper.select: /*마이페이지 메인 나의 정보 조회*/ SELECT MBR.MBR_SQ AS mbrSq /*회원_순번*/ , IFNULL(MBR.MBR_PROFILE_IMG_URL, ARTST.ARTST_PROFILE_IMG_URL) AS mbrProfileImgUrl /*회원_프로필사진_URL*/ , MBR.MBR_NCKNM AS mbrNcknm /*회원_닉네임*/ , MBR.MBR_ID AS mbrId /*회원_아이디*/ , (CASE WHEN MBR.AUTH_SQ = '1' THEN '컬렉터' WHEN MBR.AUTH_SQ = '2' THEN '아티스트' WHEN MBR.AUTH_SQ = '3' THEN '관리자' END) AS mbrTypNm /*회원_구분_이름*/ , IFNULL((SELECT SUM(COMT_SCRAPS) FROM TBL_DA_COMT_M WHERE MBR_SQ = MBR.MBR_SQ), 0) AS mbrScraps /*회원_스크랩수*/ , IFNULL((SELECT SUM(COMT_LIKES) FROM TBL_DA_COMT_M WHERE MBR_SQ = MBR.MBR_SQ), 0) AS mbrLikes /*회원_좋아요수*/ , (SELECT COUNT(NOTI_SQ) FROM TBL_DA_NOTI_M WHERE MBR_SQ = MBR.MBR_SQ) AS mbrNotis /*회원_알림수*/ , MBR.MBR_FACEBOOK_URL AS mbrFacebookUrl /*회원_페이스북_URL*/ , MBR.MBR_INSTAR_URL AS mbrInstarUrl /*회원_인스타그램_URL*/ , MBR.MBR_YOUTUBE_URL AS mbrYoutubeUrl /*회원_유투브_URL*/ , MBR.MBR_TWITTER_URL AS mbrTwitterUrl /*회원_트위터_URL*/ FROM TBL_DA_MBR_M AS MBR LEFT JOIN TBL_DA_ARTST_M AS ARTST ON MBR.MBR_SQ = ARTST.MBR_SQ WHERE MBR.MBR_SQ = #{mbrSq}

/*마이페이지 메인 나의 작품 조회*/ SELECT WORKS.WORK_SQ AS workSq /*작품_순번*/ , IFNULL(WORKS.WORK_MAIN_IMG_URL, WORKS.WORK_IMG_FRT_URL) AS workMainImgUrl /*작품_메인_이미지_URL*/ , WORKS.WORK_NM AS workNm /*작품_이름*/ , WORKS.ARTST_SQ AS artstSq /*작가_순번*/ , IFNULL(WORKS.ARTST_ACTVTY_NM, WORKS.ARTST_ENGLS_NM) AS artstActvtyNm /*작가_활동명*/ , WORKS.WORK_SIZE_WIDTH AS workSizeWidth /*작품_사이즈_가로*/ , WORKS.WORK_SIZE_DEPTH AS workSizeDepth /*작품_사이즈_세로*/ FROM TBL_DA_WORK_M AS WORKS LEFT JOIN TBL_DA_ARTST_M AS ARTST ON WORKS.ARTST_SQ = ARTST.ARTST_SQ LEFT JOIN TBL_DA_MBR_M AS MBR ON WORKS.MBR_SQ = MBR.MBR_SQ WHERE WORKS.MBR_SQ = #{mbrSq} AND WORKS.DEL_YN = 'N' AND WORKS.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY WORKS.REG_DT DESC LIMIT #{limit}

/*마이페이지 메인 나의 작품 총 갯수 조회*/ SELECT COUNT(WORKS.WORK_SQ) AS total FROM TBL_DA_WORK_M AS WORKS LEFT JOIN TBL_DA_ARTST_M AS ARTST ON WORKS.ARTST_SQ = ARTST.ARTST_SQ LEFT JOIN TBL_DA_MBR_M AS MBR ON WORKS.MBR_SQ = MBR.MBR_SQ WHERE WORKS.MBR_SQ = #{mbrSq} AND WORKS.DEL_YN = 'N' AND WORKS.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND WORKS.WORK_TYP_CD = #{workTypCd}

/*마이페이지 메인 나의 커뮤니티 조회*/ SELECT COMT.COMT_SQ AS comtSq /*커뮤니티_순번*/ , COMT.MBR_SQ AS mbrSq /*회원_순번*/ , COMT.WORK_SQ AS workSq /*작품_순번*/ , COMT.ARTST_SQ AS artstSq /*작가_순번*/ , COMT.DEAL_SQ AS dealSq /*거래_순번*/ , COMT.COMT_TYP_CD AS comtTypCd /*커뮤니티_타입_코드*/ , CDDTL.DTL_CD_NM AS comtTypCdNm /*커뮤니티_타입_코드_이름*/ , COMT.COMT_IMG_URL AS comtImgUrl /*커뮤니티_이미지_URL*/ , COMT_TITLE AS comtTitle /*커뮤니티_제목*/ , IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(CMT_SQ) FROM TBL_DA_COMT_CMTS_R WHERE COMT.COMT_SQ = COMT_SQ), 0) + IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(REPLY_SQ) FROM TBL_DA_COMT_REPLYS_R WHERE COMT.COMT_SQ = COMT_SQ), 0) AS cmtTotalCount /*커뮤니티_댓글_총갯수*/ , COMT.REG_DT AS regDt /*등록_일시*/ , COMT.REG_MBR_SQ AS regMbrSq /*등록_회원_순번*/ , COMT.UPDT_DT AS updtDt /*수정_일시*/ , COMT.UPDT_MBR_SQ AS updtMbrSq /*수정_회원_순번*/ , COMT.COMT_LIKES AS cmtLikes /*커뮤니티글_좋아요*/ , COMT.COMT_SCRAPS AS cmtScraps /*커뮤니티글_스크랩*/ FROM TBL_DA_COMT_M AS COMT LEFT JOIN TBL_DA_MBR_M AS MBR ON COMT.MBR_SQ = MBR.MBR_SQ LEFT JOIN TBL_DA_WORK_M AS WORKS ON COMT.WORK_SQ = WORKS.WORK_SQ LEFT JOIN TBL_DA_ARTST_M AS ARTST ON COMT.ARTST_SQ = ARTST.ARTST_SQ LEFT JOIN TBL_DA_DEAL_M AS DEAL ON COMT.DEAL_SQ = DEAL.DEAL_SQ LEFT JOIN TBL_DA_COMN_CD_M AS CD ON CD.CD = 'COMT_TYP_CD' LEFT JOIN TBL_DA_COMN_DTL_CD_S AS CDDTL ON CD.CD_SQ = CDDTL.CD_SQ AND CDDTL.DTL_CD = COMT.COMT_TYP_CD WHERE COMT.MBR_SQ = #{mbrSq} AND COMT.COMT_TYP_CD = #{comtTypCd} AND COMT.DEL_YN = 'N' AND COMT.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY COMT.REG_DT DESC
LIMIT #{limit}

/* 마이페이지 메인 스크랩 */ SELECT SCRAP.MBR_SQ AS mbrSq , ( CASE WHEN SCRAP.WORK_SQ IS NOT NULL AND SCRAP.WORK_SQ != '' THEN 'WORK' WHEN SCRAP.DEAL_SQ IS NOT NULL AND SCRAP.DEAL_SQ != '' THEN 'DEAL' WHEN SCRAP.COMT_SQ IS NOT NULL AND SCRAP.COMT_SQ != '' THEN 'COMT' WHEN SCRAP.MGZ_SQ IS NOT NULL AND SCRAP.MGZ_SQ != '' THEN 'MGZ' ELSE NULL END ) AS scrapDivCd , IF(SCRAP.DEAL_SQ IS NOT NULL AND SCRAP.DEAL_SQ != '', (SELECT DEAL_STTS_CD FROM TBL_DA_DEAL_M WHERE DEAL_STTS_CD != 'ST' AND DEAL_SQ = SCRAP.DEAL_SQ), NULL) AS dealSttsCd , IF(SCRAP.COMT_SQ IS NOT NULL AND SCRAP.COMT_SQ != '', (SELECT COMT_TYP_CD FROM TBL_DA_COMT_M WHERE COMT_SQ = SCRAP.COMT_SQ), NULL) AS comtTypCd , ( CASE WHEN SCRAP.WORK_SQ IS NOT NULL AND SCRAP.WORK_SQ != '' THEN SCRAP.WORK_SQ WHEN SCRAP.DEAL_SQ IS NOT NULL AND SCRAP.DEAL_SQ != '' THEN SCRAP.DEAL_SQ WHEN SCRAP.COMT_SQ IS NOT NULL AND SCRAP.COMT_SQ != '' THEN SCRAP.COMT_SQ WHEN SCRAP.MGZ_SQ IS NOT NULL AND SCRAP.MGZ_SQ != '' THEN SCRAP.MGZ_SQ ELSE NULL END ) AS sqNumber , ( CASE WHEN SCRAP.WORK_SQ IS NOT NULL AND SCRAP.WORK_SQ != '' THEN (SELECT IFNULL(WORK_MAIN_IMG_URL, WORK_IMG_FRT_URL) FROM TBL_DA_WORK_M WHERE WORK_SQ = SCRAP.WORK_SQ) WHEN SCRAP.DEAL_SQ IS NOT NULL AND SCRAP.DEAL_SQ != '' THEN (SELECT IFNULL(B.WORK_MAIN_IMG_URL, B.WORK_IMG_FRT_URL) FROM TBL_DA_DEAL_M AS A LEFT JOIN TBL_DA_WORK_M AS B ON A.WORK_SQ = B.WORK_SQ WHERE A.DEAL_SQ = SCRAP.DEAL_SQ) WHEN SCRAP.COMT_SQ IS NOT NULL AND SCRAP.COMT_SQ != '' THEN (SELECT COMT_IMG_URL FROM TBL_DA_COMT_M WHERE COMT_SQ = SCRAP.COMT_SQ) ELSE NULL END ) AS imgUrl FROM TBL_DA_MBR_SCRAP_R AS SCRAP WHERE SCRAP.MBR_SQ = #{mbrSq} ORDER BY SCRAP.REG_DT DESC LIMIT #{limit}

/* 마이페이지 메인 스크랩 전체 갯수 조회 */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_DA_MBR_SCRAP_R AS SCRAP LEFT JOIN TBL_DA_WORK_M AS WORKS ON SCRAP.WORK_SQ = WORKS.WORK_SQ AND WORKS.WORK_OPEN_YN = 'Y' AND WORKS.USE_YN = 'Y' AND WORKS.DEL_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN TBL_DA_COMT_M AS COMT ON SCRAP.COMT_SQ = COMT.COMT_SQ AND COMT.OPEN_YN = 'Y' AND COMT.USE_YN = 'Y' AND COMT.DEL_YN = 'N' WHERE SCRAP.MBR_SQ = #{mbrSq}

/*마이페이지 메인 나의 알람 조회*/ SELECT NOTI.COMT_SQ AS comtSq /*커뮤니티_순번*/ , NOTI.MBR_SQ AS mbrSq /*회원_순번*/ , NOTI.WORK_SQ AS workSq /*작품_순번*/ , NOTI.ARTST_SQ AS artstSq /*작가_순번*/ , NOTI.DEAL_SQ AS dealSq /*거래_순번*/ , NOTI.COMT_TYP_CD AS comtTypCd /*커뮤니티_타입_코드*/ , NOTI.COMT_IMG_URL AS comtImgUrl /*커뮤니티_이미지_URL*/ , NOTI.REG_DT AS regDt /*등록_일시*/ , NOTI.REG_MBR_SQ AS regMbrSq /*등록_회원_순번*/ , NOTI.UPDT_DT AS updtDt /*수정_일시*/ , NOTI.UPDT_MBR_SQ AS updtMbrSq /*수정_회원_순번*/ FROM TBL_DA_NOTI_M AS NOTI WHERE COMT.MBR_SQ = #{mbrSq} AND COMT.DEL_YN = 'N' AND COMT.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY COMT.REG_DT DESC LIMIT #{limit}

/*마이페이지 나의 작품 스크랩 개수 조회*/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_DA_MBR_SCRAP_R SCRAP LEFT JOIN TBL_DA_WORK_M AS A ON SCRAP.WORK_SQ = A.WORK_SQ WHERE SCRAP.MBR_SQ = #{mbrSq} AND (SCRAP.WORK_SQ IS NOT NULL AND SCRAP.WORK_SQ != '') AND (SCRAP.COMT_SQ IS NULL OR SCRAP.COMT_SQ = '') AND (SCRAP.MGZ_SQ IS NULL OR SCRAP.MGZ_SQ = '') AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' /*작품 삭제 여부 확인 */
AND ( A.WORK_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') OR A.ARTST_ACTVTY_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') OR A.ARTST_ENGLS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') )

/*마이페이지 거래 스크랩 개수 조회*/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_DA_MBR_SCRAP_R SCRAP LEFT JOIN TBL_DA_DEAL_M AS A ON SCRAP.DEAL_SQ = A.DEAL_SQ LEFT JOIN TBL_DA_WORK_M AS B ON A.WORK_SQ = B.WORK_SQ WHERE SCRAP.MBR_SQ = #{mbrSq} AND (SCRAP.DEAL_SQ IS NOT NULL AND SCRAP.DEAL_SQ != '') AND A.DEAL_STTS_CD != 'ST'
AND ( B.WORK_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') OR B.ARTST_ACTVTY_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') OR B.ARTST_ENGLS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') )

if.test: cuponIdntfctnNum != '' and cuponIdntfctnNum != null and endDate != null and endDate != ''

update.if: UPDATE TBL_DA_CUPON_M SET USE_YN = 'N' WHERE NOW() >= #{endDate} AND CUPON_IDNTFCTN_NUM = #{cuponIdntfctnNum}

mapper.select: /* 쿠폰 리스트 - 목록*/ SELECT CM.CUPON_SQ as cuponSq ,CM.CUPON_DIV_CD as cuponDivCd ,( select CDCS.DTL_CD_NM from TBL_DA_COMN_DTL_CD_S CDCS where (CDCS.USE_YN='Y' and CDCS.DEL_YN='N') and CDCS.DTL_CD=CM.CUPON_DIV_CD ) as cuponDivNm ,CM.CUPON_TYP_CD as cuponTypCd ,( select CDCS.DTL_CD_NM from TBL_DA_COMN_DTL_CD_S CDCS where (CDCS.USE_YN='Y' and CDCS.DEL_YN='N') and CDCS.DTL_CD=CM.CUPON_TYP_CD ) as cuponTypNm ,CM.CUPON_DETAIL_CD as cuponDetailCd ,( select CDCS.DTL_CD_NM from TBL_DA_COMN_DTL_CD_S CDCS where (CDCS.USE_YN='Y' and CDCS.DEL_YN='N') and CDCS.DTL_CD=CM.CUPON_DETAIL_CD ) as cuponDetailNm ,CM.DISC_TYP_CD as discTypCd ,( select CDCS.DTL_CD_NM from TBL_DA_COMN_DTL_CD_S CDCS where (CDCS.USE_YN='Y' and CDCS.DEL_YN='N') and CDCS.DTL_CD=CM.DISC_TYP_CD ) as discTypNm ,CM.CUPON_DR as cuponDr ,CM.CUPON_DISC_AMT as cuponDiscAmt ,CM.CUPON_IDNTFCTN_NUM as cuponIdntfctnNum ,CM.CUPON_NM as cuponNm ,CM.CUPON_CNTNT as cuponCntnt ,DATE_FORMAT(MCR.USE_STRT_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') as useStrtDt ,DATE_FORMAT(MCR.USE_END_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') as useEndDt ,CM.REG_MBR_SQ as regMbrSq ,CM.REG_DT as regDt ,CM.UPDT_MBR_SQ as updtMbrSq ,CM.UPDT_DT as updtDt ,CM.USE_YN as useYn ,CM.DEL_YN as delYn ,TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, MCR.USE_END_DT, CURDATE()) as diffDay ,MCR.CUPON_USE_YN as cuponUseYn ,MCR.CUPON_USE_DT as cuponUseDt FROM TBL_DA_CUPON_M CM INNER JOIN TBL_DA_MBR_CUPON_R MCR ON CM.CUPON_SQ = MCR.CUPON_SQ WHERE (CM.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CM.DEL_YN = 'N') AND MCR.MBR_SQ = #{mbrSq}

/* 쿠폰식별번호 조회 */ SELECT CM.CUPON_SQ as cuponSq ,CM.CUPON_IDNTFCTN_NUM as cuponIdntfctnNum ,CM.USE_STRT_DT as useStrtDt ,CM.USE_END_DT as useEndDt
FROM TBL_DA_CUPON_M CM WHERE (CM.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CM.DEL_YN = 'N') AND CM.CUPON_IDNTFCTN_NUM = #{cuponIdntfctnNum}

/* 거래내역 정찰가 가상계좌 입금전 리스트 */ SELECT B.DEAL_SQ AS dealSq,
IFNULL(B.SELL_MBR_SQ, (SELECT PH.MBR_SQ FROM TBL_DA_PAYMNT_H PH WHERE PH.MBR_SQ = #{mbrSq} AND PH.PAYMNT_DIV_CD = 'S' AND PH.DEAL_SQ = B.DEAL_SQ) ) AS sellMbrSq, IFNULL(B.BUY_MBR_SQ, (SELECT PH.MBR_SQ FROM TBL_DA_PAYMNT_H PH WHERE PH.MBR_SQ = #{mbrSq} AND PH.PAYMNT_DIV_CD = 'B' AND PH.DEAL_SQ = B.DEAL_SQ) ) AS buyMbrSq,
IFNULL(B.SELL_MBR_SQ, (SELECT PH.MBR_SQ FROM TBL_DA_PAYMNT_H PH WHERE PH.MBR_SQ = #{mbrSq} AND PH.PAYMNT_DIV_CD = 'S' AND PH.DEAL_SQ = B.DEAL_SQ) ) AS sellMbrSq,
IFNULL(B.BUY_MBR_SQ, (SELECT PH.MBR_SQ FROM TBL_DA_PAYMNT_H PH WHERE PH.MBR_SQ = #{mbrSq} AND PH.PAYMNT_DIV_CD = 'B' AND PH.DEAL_SQ = B.DEAL_SQ) ) AS buyMbrSq,
B.WORK_SQ AS workSq, B.ARTST_SQ AS artstSq, IF(A.WORK_MAIN_IMG_URL IS NULL, A.WORK_IMG_FRT_URL, A.WORK_MAIN_IMG_URL) AS workMainImgUrl, /*작품대표이미지주소*/ A.ARTST_ACTVTY_NM AS artstActvtyNm, A.WORK_NM AS workNm, A.WORK_PRODC_YEAR AS workProdcYear, B.DEAL_TYP_CD AS dealTypCd, B.DEAL_STTS_CD AS dealSttsCd, B.BUY_PAYMNT_STTS_CD AS buyPaymntSttsCd, B.SELL_PAYMNT_STTS_CD AS sellPaymntSttsCd, DATE_FORMAT(B.DEAL_STRT_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS dealStrtDate, /*거래시작일시*/ DATE_FORMAT(B.DEAL_ENDNG_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS dealEndngDate, /*거래종료일시*/ FORMAT(B.DEAL_STRT_PRC, 0) AS dealStrtPrc, FORMAT(B.DEAL_FINAL_PRC, 0) AS dealFinalPrc, B.DEAL_ENDNG_DT AS dealEndngDateTime /*거래종료날짜시간*/ FROM TBL_DA_WORK_M AS A INNER JOIN TBL_DA_DEAL_M AS B ON A.WORK_SQ = B.WORK_SQ INNER JOIN TBL_DA_PAYMNT_H AS C ON B.DEAL_SQ = C.DEAL_SQ AND C.PAYMETHOD = 'VACCT' AND C.MBR_SQ = #{mbrSq}
WHERE B.DEAL_TYP_CD = 'S' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' /*작품 삭제 여부 확인 */
AND B.DEAL_STTS_CD = 'TP'
AND B.DEAL_STTS_CD = 'TP'
AND B.DEAL_STTS_CD IS NULL
AND B.DEAL_STTS_CD IS NULL
AND B.DEAL_STTS_CD IS NULL
AND B.DEAL_STTS_CD IS NULL
AND B.DEAL_STTS_CD IS NULL
AND B.DEAL_STTS_CD IS NULL
AND ( A.ARTST_ACTVTY_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR A.ARTST_ENGLS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR A.WORK_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') )
AND DATE_FORMAT(B.DEAL_ENDNG_DT, '%Y.%m.%d') BETWEEN #{searchStrtDate} AND #{searchEndngDate}
GROUP BY B.DEAL_SQ;

/*거래내역 구매 경매 리스트*/ SELECT C.DEAL_SQ AS dealSq, /*거래순번*/ A.WORK_SQ AS workSq, /*작품번호*/ A.ARTST_SQ AS artstSq, /*작가번호*/ A.ARTST_ACTVTY_NM AS artstActvtyNm, /*작가활동명*/ A.ARTST_BIRTH_YEAR AS artstBirthYear, /*작가생년월일*/ C.DEAL_TYP_CD AS dealTypCd, /*거래유형*/ C.DEAL_STTS_CD AS dealSttsCd, /*거래상태*/ A.WORK_NM AS workNm, /*작품명*/ A.WORK_PRODC_YEAR AS workProdcYear, /*작품제작년도*/ IF(A.WORK_MAIN_IMG_URL IS NULL, A.WORK_IMG_FRT_URL, A.WORK_MAIN_IMG_URL) AS workMainImgUrl, /*작품대표이미지주소*/ A.WORK_PRODC_YEAR AS workProdcYear, /*작품제작년도*/ C.MBR_REF_NO AS mbrRefNo, /*거래주문코드*/ C.BUY_MBR_SQ AS buyMbrSq, /*거래구매자순번*/ C.SELL_MBR_SQ AS sellMbrSq, /*거래판매자순번*/ C.BUY_PAYMNT_STTS_CD AS buyPaymntSttsCd, /*거래구매자결제상태*/ C.SELL_PAYMNT_STTS_CD AS sellPaymntSttsCd, /*거래판매자결제상태*/ (SELECT FORMAT(MAX(BID_PRC), 0) FROM TBL_DA_AUCTN_BID_H WHERE C.DEAL_SQ = DEAL_SQ) AS maxBidPrc, /*응찰가*/ FORMAT(C.DEAL_STRT_PRC, 0) AS dealStrtPrc, /*거래시작가격*/ FORMAT(C.DEAL_SBID_PRC, 0) AS dealSbidPrc, /*거래낙찰가격*/ FORMAT(C.DEAL_FINAL_PRC, 0) AS dealFinalPrc, /*거래최종가격*/ (SELECT COUNT(DEAL_SQ) FROM TBL_DA_AUCTN_BID_H WHERE C.DEAL_SQ = DEAL_SQ) AS bidCnt, /*응찰수*/ (SELECT MBR_SQ FROM TBL_DA_AUCTN_BID_H WHERE C.DEAL_SQ = DEAL_SQ ORDER BY BID_PRC DESC LIMIT 1) AS bidMbrSq, /*마지막 응찰 회원 순번*/ DATE_FORMAT(C.DEAL_STRT_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS dealStrtDate, /*거래시작날짜*/ DATE_FORMAT(C.DEAL_ENDNG_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS dealEndngDate, /*거래종료날짜*/ C.DEAL_ENDNG_DT AS dealEndngDateTime /*거래종료날짜시간*/ FROM TBL_DA_WORK_M AS A INNER JOIN TBL_DA_MBR_M AS B ON A.MBR_SQ = B.MBR_SQ INNER JOIN TBL_DA_DEAL_M AS C ON A.WORK_SQ = C.WORK_SQ INNER JOIN TBL_DA_AUCTN_BID_H AS D ON C.DEAL_SQ = D.DEAL_SQ WHERE C.DEAL_TYP_CD = 'A' AND C.DEAL_STRT_DT <= NOW() AND D.MBR_SQ IN (#{mbrSq}) AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' /*작품 삭제 여부 확인 */
AND C.DEAL_STTS_CD = 'TP'
AND C.DEAL_STTS_CD = 'TC'
AND C.DEAL_STTS_CD = 'PD'
AND C.DEAL_STTS_CD = 'DS'
AND C.DEAL_STTS_CD = 'DC'
AND C.DEAL_STTS_CD = 'PC'
AND C.DEAL_STTS_CD = 'FB'
AND ( A.ARTST_ACTVTY_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR A.ARTST_ENGLS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR A.WORK_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') )
AND DATE_FORMAT(C.DEAL_ENDNG_DT, '%Y.%m.%d') BETWEEN #{searchStrtDate} AND #{searchEndngDate}
GROUP BY C.DEAL_SQ;

mapper.select: /* 나의 작품 상세의 자랑하기에 보여질 리스트 */ SELECT A.COMT_SQ AS comtSq /*커뮤니티_순번*/ , A.MBR_SQ AS mbrSq /*회원_순번*/ , A.WORK_SQ AS workSq /*작품_순번*/ , A.ARTST_SQ AS artstSq /*작가_순번*/ , A.DEAL_SQ AS dealSq /*거래_순번*/ , A.COMT_TYP_CD AS comtTypCd /*커뮤니티_타입_코드*/ , G.DTL_CD_NM AS comtTypCdNm /*커뮤니티_타입_코드_이름*/ , A.COMT_IMG_URL AS comtImgUrl /*커뮤니티_이미지_URL*/ , A.COMT_TITLE AS comtTitle /*커뮤니티_제목*/ , IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(A1.CMT_SQ) FROM TBL_DA_COMT_CMTS_R A1 WHERE A.COMT_SQ = A1.COMT_SQ), 0) + IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(A2.REPLY_SQ) FROM TBL_DA_COMT_REPLYS_R A2 WHERE A.COMT_SQ = A2.COMT_SQ), 0) AS cmtTotalCount /*커뮤니티_댓글_총갯수*/ , A.REG_DT AS regDt /*등록_일시*/ , A.REG_MBR_SQ AS regMbrSq /*등록_회원_순번*/ , A.UPDT_DT AS updtDt /*수정_일시*/ , A.UPDT_MBR_SQ AS updtMbrSq /*수정_회원_순번*/ , A.COMT_LIKES AS cmtLikes /*커뮤니티글_좋아요*/ , A.COMT_SCRAPS AS cmtScraps /*커뮤니티글_스크랩*/ , A.COMT_VIEWS AS cmtViews /*커뮤니티글_스크랩*/ , A.OPEN_YN AS cmtOpenYn /*커뮤니티글_공개 유무*/ , A.COMT_CONTENT AS cmtContent /*커뮤니티글_내용*/ , C.ARTST_ACTVTY_NM AS artstActvtyNm /*작가활동명*/ , C.WORK_NM AS workNm /*작품_이름*/ , D.ARTST_PROFILE_IMG_URL AS artstProfileImgUrl /*작가프로필사진주소*/ , B.MBR_NCKNM AS mbrNcknm /*회원_닉네임*/ , B.MBR_INTRO AS mbrIntro /*회원_자기소개*/ , B.MBR_PROFILE_IMG_URL AS mbrProfileImgUrl /*회원_자기소개*/ FROM TBL_DA_COMT_M AS A LEFT JOIN TBL_DA_MBR_M AS B /* 회원 메인 */ ON A.MBR_SQ = B.MBR_SQ LEFT JOIN TBL_DA_WORK_M AS C /* 작품 메인 */ ON A.WORK_SQ = C.WORK_SQ LEFT JOIN TBL_DA_ARTST_M AS D /* 작가 메인 */ ON A.ARTST_SQ = D.ARTST_SQ LEFT JOIN TBL_DA_DEAL_M AS E ON A.DEAL_SQ = E.DEAL_SQ LEFT JOIN TBL_DA_COMN_CD_M AS F /* 공통코드 메인 */ ON F.CD = 'COMT_TYP_CD' LEFT JOIN TBL_DA_COMN_DTL_CD_S AS G /* 공통코드 상세 서브 */ ON F.CD_SQ = G.CD_SQ AND G.DTL_CD = A.COMT_TYP_CD WHERE 1=1 AND A.WORK_SQ = #{workSq} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.COMT_TYP_CD = 'BOA' /* 자랑하기 */ ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC
/*회원명 가져오기*/ SELECT MBR_NM FROM TBL_DA_MBR_M WHERE MBR_SQ = #{mbrSq}
